content.rendered:
Red Rose Premium Rice is ideal for desserts such as Kheer, Rice Pudding, etc. It is also best suited for Curd Rice, Coconut Rice & Bisi Bele Bath (a popular delicacy of Karnataka).
Due to its delicate texture & thin grain size, it is perfect for recipes that involve boiling rice or using pre-cooked rice. Its nutty, floral aroma & soft, fluffy texture works well in many South Indian as well as North Indian dishes.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Red Rose High-Quality Rice
  • Very thin & delicate
  • XXL size grain
  • Perfectly aged rice suitable for everyday cooking & special occasions
  • Perfect for boiled rice
